communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

In a Twitter post, Board President Shi, head of the agency posted the following:

"While I am still figuring out what/when/how I am going to say things, to continue to practice transparency, I wanted to share a few things about where:
Email: Jshi5@cps.edu
Twitter: @JiananShi
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094730569723
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jiananshi_cpsboard/?igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA%3D%3D…"

Requesting all electronic messages on the above-referenced social media platforms excluding email (Twitter, Facebook and Instagram), including these profiles and any others that Board President Shi utilizes to conduct business between July 18, 2021 2023 through July 21, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
